links.title: A Tesla Model S hits 300,000 miles in just 2 years - saving an estimated $60,000 on fuel and maintenance
links.description: There's no one taking full advantage of Tesla's unlimited mileage warranty and relatively free Supercharger network like Tesloop, a transport company offering rides exclusively in Tesla vehicles in California. One of their vehicles, a Model S, has reached 300,000 miles yesterday and they now shared their experience with the electric car.

messages.body: $TSLA Ferrari? Pfft. https://cleantechnica.com/2017/08/29/tesla-crushes-competition-ultimate-street-car-win/

links.title: Tesla Crushes Ferrari 458 Italia For "Ultimate Street Car" Win (Videos)
links.description: Afeez Damilola Alade-Kolawole, founder of and Tesla Rentals ecarTestDrives , recently took a Tesla Model S P100D to the famous Santa Pod Raceway's Ultimate Street Car competition. It will surprise no one here to learn that the Tesla was a winner.

messages.body: $TSLA $LIT " If you look at the graph to the right,it is clear that [renewables] will be well ahead...." http://reneweconomy.com.au/wind-solar-produce-three-times-energy-iea-admits-73382/

links.title: Wind and solar produce three times more energy than IEA admits
links.description: The IEA energy statistics underestimates the role of wind and solar in the world's energy mix. The counting method must be changed to help policymakers and investors to understand how near the world is to a transition to an energy supply dominated by solar and wind power. Share this:

messages.body: $TSLA competition: https://electrek.co/2017/08/29/cummins-beats-tesla-unveil-all-electric-truck/

links.title: Diesel engine manufacturer Cummins goes electric with new truck ahead of Tesla Semi unveil
links.description: While electric truck enthusiasts are anticipating the unveiling of Tesla's all-electric truck next month, diesel engine manufacturer Cummins beat the electric car manufacturer to the punch by unveiling its own electric truck effort today. Without too much fanfare, Cummins unveiled the truck called AEOS at its historic technical center in Columbus, Indiana, today.

links.title: Cummins unveils an electric big rig weeks before Tesla
links.description: Sorry, Tesla, but someone just stole the thunder from the electric big rig you were planning to unveil this fall. The engine giant Cummins has unveiled a concept semi truck, the AEOS, that runs entirely on the power of an electric motor and a 140kWh battery pack.
